name: InvasivePneumococcalDiseaseTestsForStreptococcusPneumoniaeAntigenInSpecimenFromNormallySterileSite
title: Invasive Pneumococcal Disease (Tests for Streptococcus pneumoniae Antigen in Specimen from Normally Sterile Site)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Streptococcus pneumoniae antigen from a normally sterile site),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Streptococcus pneumoniae ag (normally sterile sites);  

LOINC search: 'Streptococcus pneumoniae Ag (serum or CSF)'),(Exclusion Criteria: Specimen  = Urine, Sputum, Unspecified specimen)
